attributes.action: Not cancel driving tests and theory tests
attributes.background: I want the government to re asses the lockdown rules and not cancel driving tests and theory testsThe Government are encouraging the public not to use public transport but at the same time driving tests are being cancelled if driving test resume during the lockdown less people will need to use them

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
